00070 struct PxRevoluteJointFlag
00071 {
00072     enum Enum
00073     {
00074         eLIMIT_ENABLED          = 1<<0,     //< enable the limit
00075         eDRIVE_ENABLED          = 1<<1,     //< enable the drive
00076         eDRIVE_FREESPIN         = 1<<2      //< if the existing velocity is beyond the drive velocity, do not add force
00077     };
00078 };
00079 
00080 typedef PxFlags<PxRevoluteJointFlag::Enum, PxU16> PxRevoluteJointFlags;
00081 PX_FLAGS_OPERATORS(PxRevoluteJointFlag::Enum, PxU16);
00082
